entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
